attributes.background: So many cats are found as strays on the streets or can indeed get lost simply by getting in a delivery van. Finding the owner of a missing cat would be much easier if cats were, by law, microchipped the same as Dogs.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104904

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
